stp.action

This module contains Actions of the STP(A) hierarchy.

Package Contents

Classes

IAction

Interface for actions.

IFiniteAction

Interface for actions that end

Ctx

Context for actions, dummy for now
class stp.action.IAction

Bases: abc.ABC

Interface for actions.

abstract tick(self, intent) → None
